info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union County through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Union, or near Buffalo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Rose Hill State Park, Jonesville, Sedalia, Santuc and Cross Keys. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
